about_the_game:
Classic Japanese MMORPG "ASTRAL TALE" is making its official release!. Embark on cute adventures under the starry sky, heal your soul, become a one-of-a-kind adventurer, journey with familiar companions into a new chapter, explore the beautiful starry world freely, and shape your destiny to create legends!

【Explore the Astral Realm, Forge Adventures】

Embark on a journey of free exploration in a vast fantasy world, uncover hidden treasures, immerse yourself in adventures and legends unknown, and join hands with your fellow adventurers as you head towards the horizons of the sky and the sea!

【Freedom to Change Class, Your Mastery at the Helm】

Switch between multiple Class at will, allowing your mood or tactical needs to change roles whenever necessary. In the Astral Realm, you can always find your unique style, returning to the initial excitement of role-playing!

【With You in Battle, Stellar Companions】

Powerful companions from the stars have descended at this moment. From the first encounter to building deep connections, they grow alongside you. Each stellarian has their unique story and charm, becoming an indispensable part of your adventures!

【Explore Hidden Worlds With your own personal Mobile Cottage】

Wherever the mobile cottage goes, it takes you there! With its unique three-level design and customizable interior, along with a rich array of life systems including greenhouse gardening, alchemy in the basement, cooking, tailoring, and more, you can create a one-of-a-kind space that's truly your own!

【Rich Wardrobe, Unique Appearance】

Obtain a wealth of free outfits appearance, allowing you to create versatile character images without extra money. From classical elegance to cyber-future, become the cutest adventurer with charm that touches the heart!

Embark on cute adventures under the starry sky, heal your soul, become a one-of-a-kind adventurer, journey with familiar companions into a new chapter, explore the beautiful starry world freely, and shape your destiny to create legends!

name: ASTRAL TALE-星界神話

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP Sp3 / Vista / Win7 / Win8 / Win10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 2.8 GHz 以上 AMD K8 2600+ 以上
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8400 以上 ATI Radeon X1600 以上 ( 支援3D圖像處理 )
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP Sp3 / Vista / Win7 / Win8 / Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.66 GHz 以上 AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 以上
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 9500 以上 ATI Radeon HD4570 以上 ( 支援3D圖像處理 )

short_description: "ASTRAL TALE"- Myth of the Stars," a classic Japanese MMORPG, is now officially operating worldwide. A brand-new profession has been introduced, allowing players to embark on a unique journey across the stars together!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
